desc:
Gets formatting information for text, given a wrap limit.

This function accounts for newlines correctly (i.e. '\n').

args.name: text
args.desc: The text that will be wrapped.

args.name: wraplimit
args.desc: The maximum width in pixels of each line that text is allowed before wrapping.

rets.name: width
rets.desc: The maximum width of the wrapped text.

rets.name: wrappedText
rets.desc: A sequence containing each line of text that was wrapped.
